Class Parser

java.lang.Object
utilities.Parser
public class Parser extends Object
The Parser class reads an XML file and checks for syntax and structural errors. It identifies invalid or malformed tags and ensures proper nesting.

Usage: 


 java -jar Parser.jar <XML file path>

Since:
2024-11-22
